name: Constant Asteroid
description:
You can manage a planetary defense system to protect earth from the constant threat of asteroids.

Your goal is to survive for 3 minutes.

Controls:

  • Use the control rod slider to change power output.
  • Use the "W" and "S" key or the button on screen to allocate power to weapon or shield.

Some tips:

  • Shield power level 5 can mitigate damage from small asteroids entirely.
  • Give more power to shields to counter numerous small fast asteroids, while weapon are best used to counter larger single targets.
  • Fire rate increases with more weapon power.
  • Shield regen faster with more shield power.
  • Lifting the control rod increases the temperature and power output.

GitHub repo: https://github.com/0Xiaohei0/reactorGame
